description: Test galaxy to see how factions expand and wage war
author: Celludriel

factionStart.name: The Teladi Mercantile
factionStart.description:
Ever since you hatched from your egg you have been enamored with value and money, in fact they were your most spoken words during your adolescent 'eggspeak' 
When your eyes started to change from the pale yellow that marks Teladi youth to the deep red of a mature citizen in the great trade empire the others looked at you with a sense you should leave the planetside and seek out the life of a true Teladi.
With that you gather your belongings and sell them all, buying a modest ship to begin your great search for the universes greatest profitssss!

factionStart.name: The Holy Crusade
factionStart.description: The Paranid high council ousted the holy order from the political high council.  Declaring state and religion seperate entities.  The Holy Order has risen to right this injustice, you are one of it's sainted crusaders go and take back our birthright and eliminate any unbelievers in your path

factionStart.name: The Argon Saga
factionStart.description: The Argon Federation is a proud place to call home: the center of culture, science and learning in the universe. This pride is born of a long and storied history; of a bold and daring risk to lure the greatest threat the universe has known away from Earth and a sacrifice to save a home they would never return to. The Argon people were forced to began anew in a place unfamiliar to them and have thrived since. Do you have what it takes to continue this saga?

factionStart.name: The Paranid Supremacy
factionStart.description: 'Only he who has three eyes can fully grasp three-dimensionality. Only he who fully grasps three-dimensionality can be holy.' -Paranid Bashra, 1st and 2nd Axiom. The Paranid are strong, the Paranid are smart, the Paranid are holy, chosen ones to 'Reclaim the skies' from all others. Anything not Paranid is desecration of the holy light and not to be trusted. Go forth in the name of the Pontifex Maximus and show the universe Paranid supremacy
